name: Sporthotel Manni, Mayrhofen
description:
Our Sporthotel is centrally located in Mayrhofen in Zillertal. The location is particularly suitable for excursions and sports activities, such as mountain-biking, skiing and hiking while your holidays in Austria.
Sporthotel Manni

With its personal and individual service, the Mannlicher Family provides for your every comfort, a pleasant atmosphere and an international flair.

The 4-star Hotel Manni in Mayrhofen in Zillertal guarantees an unforgettable holiday and offers ideal facilities for active holidaymakers – year round!
